definition: A term referring to the circumstances and conditions under which work is performed, encompassing various factors such as physical environment, hours, safety, and social aspects. It is commonly used in discussions related to labor rights, employment regulations, and workplace conditions.

examples.german: Die Arbeitsbedingungen in diesem Unternehmen sind sehr gut.
examples.english: The working conditions in this company are very good.

examples.german: Die Arbeitsbedingungen haben sich in den letzten Jahren verbessert.
examples.english: The working conditions have improved in recent years.
Unions fight for better working conditions.

examples.german: Die Arbeitsbedingungen in der Fabrik sind unzumutbar.
examples.english: The working conditions in the factory are unacceptable.

examples.german: Arbeitsbedingungen können die Produktivität der Mitarbeiter beeinflussen.
examples.english: Working conditions can affect employee productivity.
